products.name: Classic White Blouse
products.description: A timeless white blouse crafted from premium cotton blend fabric. Features elegant button details and a flattering cut that suits any occasion.

products.name: Elegant Black Dress
products.description: A sophisticated black dress perfect for evening events. Made with high-quality fabric that drapes beautifully and features subtle side slits.

products.name: Casual Denim Jacket
products.description: A versatile denim jacket that adds an effortlessly cool touch to any outfit. Features classic button closures and comfortable fit.

products.name: Floral Summer Dress
products.description: A light and airy summer dress featuring a beautiful floral print. Perfect for warm days and garden parties.

products.name: Tailored Black Pants
products.description: Classic black pants with a modern tailored fit. Perfect for office wear or formal occasions.
